forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the night stretches into the early hours, Downtown San Francisco finds itself enveloped in a gentle veil of clouds, with a slight drizzle whispering through the air—a reminder of the city's ever-changing moods. The temperature hovers around a mild and unassuming 55 degrees, while a soft wind from the west-southwest dances lightly through the streets, bringing a coolness that feels refreshing against freshly awakened skin. 

As dawn approaches, a hint of clarity emerges, promising a brightening of the skies. By mid-morning, the possibility of intermittent drizzle may linger, but soon the sun will stretch its warm rays, lifting the city to a cozy high near 64 degrees. The forecasted winds, gentle yet steady, will nudge away any remnants of mist, allowing golden rays to mingle with the inhabitants of this lively metropolis. For those venturing out, light layers will guard against the coolness while also providing comfort when the sun shines brightly. A stroll along the Embarcadero would be delightful, perhaps leading to a quiet café where one might savor a warm pastry with an artisan brew. A relaxing walk through the city's serene parks or a visit to an art gallery may also beckon, allowing for a day that balances activity and repose, beautifully aligned with the pulse of an evolving urban landscape.
